sources.title: Centerspace data breach class action settlement
sources.snippet: Under the terms of the Centerspace settlement, affected consumers can receive cash and other benefits. sources.title: Rent control in the United States - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: In the United States, rent control refers to laws or ordinances that set price controls on the rent of residential housing to function as a price ceiling. [1] More loosely, "rent control" describes several types of price control: "strict price ceilings", also known as "rent freeze" systems, or "absolute" or "first generation" rent controls, in which no increases in rent are allowed at all ...
